statements: UPDATE player_location_archives SET event_type = 'DISCONNECTED' WHERE player_id = 123 AND location_id = 456
UPDATE player_location_archives SET event_description = 'Player moved to a new area' WHERE location_id = 789 AND event_type = 'MOVE'
UPDATE player_location_archives SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00', event_description = 'Player moved to a new location' WHERE player_id = 123 AND location_id = 456
UPDATE player_location_archives SET event_type = 'Player Action', timestamp = '2022-01-18 08:45:00', location_id = 789 WHERE player_id = 456 AND event_description LIKE '%discovered%'
UPDATE player_locations SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)'), timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = 10, total_score = 500, level = 3 WHERE player_id = '98765432-12ab-cdef-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE player_locations SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 2)'), timestamp = now() WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = games_played + 1, total_score = total_score + 100, level = level + 1 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE player_locations SET location_x = 10.5, location_y = 20.3 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_activities SET activity_type = 'Exploration', activity_description = 'Explored a new area' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_locations SET location_x = 10.5, location_y = 20.3, location_z = 15.7 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_statistics SET score = score + 50, level = 5 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_locations SET location_name = 'Castle Black' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profile SET age = 25, player_name = 'Jon Snow' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profile SET age = 25, gender = 'Male' WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_locations SET location_name = 'Cave of Shadows', timestamp = NOW() WHERE player_id = 102;
UPDATE player_activities SET activity_type = 'PvP' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 67890;
UPDATE player_locations SET location_name = 'New Location' WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1, join_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE player_id = 202;
